Source: message_types/sticker_message.js

"use strict";

/************
 * Requires *
 ************/

var FileMessage = require("./file_message");

/****************************
 * The StickerMessage class *
 ****************************/

/**
 * A message which contains a downloadable sticker file
 *
 * @extends FileMessage
 */
class StickerMessage extends FileMessage {
	/**
	 * Creates a new StickerMessage object
	 *
	 * @param {Object}Â message	A raw message object from an update
	 * @param {BotAPI} API	An instance of a BotAPI from teleapiwrapper which will be used to do stuff with this message
	 *
	 * @private
	 */
	constructor(message, API) {
		// Call the super constructor
		super(message, API);
	}

	/**
	 * The [Sticker]{@link https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#sticker} object this message contains
	 *
	 * @type {Object}
	 * @property {String} file_id	ID of the sticker
	 * @property {Integer} width	Width of the sticker in pixels
	 * @property {Integer} height	Height of the sticker in pixels
	 * @property {Object} [thumb]	The thumb of the sticker, as a [PhotoSize]{@link https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#photosize} object
	 * @property {Integer} [file_size]	File size of the sticker, in bytes
	 * @thumb
	 * @readonly
	 */
	get sticker() {
		return this.rawMessage.sticker;
	}
}

/***********
 * Exports *
 ***********/

module.exports = StickerMessage;
